properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX out 20 NM
properties.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 23 at 3:54AM CST until January 23 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, dense fog will reduce
visibility to one mile or less. For the Small Craft Advisory,
seas 6 to 8 feet.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel
TX out 20 NM.

* WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 AM CST this
morning. For the Small Craft Advisory, until noon CST today.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft. Low
visibility will make navigation difficult.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY
